survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from EV owners regarding their satisfaction and experiences with public EV charging stations to identify areas for improvement and better service delivery.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max 3 selections

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button with a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations you have used to other EV owners?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for simplicity. Include a 'Not sure' option for neutrality.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations you have used to other EV owners?
